Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
05.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
01.10.2012 JH SCR17529 Added GB324 File encoding
04.04.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
11.01.2010 GB SCR15231 Extended condition for selection (2. Start automatic ...)
//14.07.2004 EE SCR#6613 changed selection rule and new field on screen
15.04.2004 EE SCR#5951 changed display fields
13.05.2003 SH SCR3380 Removed column "Bank address" and added two new
- columns "Number of payments" and "Total amount" for handling BADT rows.
16.04.2003 SH SCR3267 Switched off the transaction in task "Select not handeld
- BADT rows" because we had locking problems with the started BPH220 as
- submit server job.
02.04.2003 RR -> SCR3198 Implementation of shortcut handling
23.01.2003 JJ implemented new authorization/screen title concept
16.12.2002 SH SCR2527 Add new button "Delete" to onlien task "Select not handled
- BADT rows"
16.05.2002 JJ SCR1281 replaced link (task) GNRD by call UFB533(OS format)
06.05.2002 SH BPH220 will be now called as submit serverjob, was disabled before
- only for test
25.03.2002 SH Call BPH220 as submit serverjob by GB701
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
-- Start BPH210 - Import bank files
-- Open filedialog
Change imported file to UTF-8
-- Start import of bank file?
-- Start import of bank file, if user pressed 'YES'
-- Leave OAD610
-- Start BPH220 only
-- Select on BADT row to be handled
-- Start automatic payment handling
-- submit serverjob for BPH220
-- Leave OAD610 only if user didn't pressed button "Delete", see next block
-- END BLOCK v.WhatToDo = 'S'
-- Start Block "Delete"

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT BADT_RUNNUMBER, CAST(SUM(BADT_NPAYMENTS) as decimal (16)), CAST(SUM(BADT_MUTDAILYSTATEMENTS) as decimal(18,2)) FROM :1/BADT, :1/ADMU WHERE ADMU_ADMNO = BADT_BANK_ADMNO and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':2' and BADT_RUNNUMBER <> 0 and ADMU_ALLOW_MODIFY_BANK = 'Y' group by BADT_RUNNUMBER FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 1000 ROWS

Text.val: -- Display Administration/Ledger from first BADT row
-- Show only BADT rows which are not in the table TEMP_JOBSTATUS
-- If there is a row with the BADT_RUNNUMBER in this table this indicates,
-- that already a job is running to handle the BADT row or the system crashed.
-- If the system crashed, the IT-Department is responsible to give the job free.
-- Get bank details for display

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OAD610]: Online starting of automatic payment handling')

Text.val: -- Button OK and Cancel
-- Button OK
-- Button Delete

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OAD610]: Online starting of import bank files')

Text.val: -- Button OK and Cancel
-- Button OK
-- Close OAD610 if there is no selection
-- Delete all BADT rows (including all BADP/BDPD rows) which belongs to
-- the actual BADT_RUNNUMBER from the online screen
-- INFO: The Online screen shows only one distinct BADT row (BADT_RUNNUMBER)
